alert.note: Alert for Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 4:25PM CDT until May 22 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL GRAY COUNTY... At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Lake Mcclellan, or 17 miles southeast of Pampa, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Lefors and Kingsmill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
